taglines.content: McKinsey Academy helps organizations thrive by accelerating their talent advantage

entry_points.title: ABOUT McKINSEY ACADEMY:
entry_points.subtitle: Academic Advisory Council
entry_points.content: The Academic Advisory Council helps to shape the research agenda for McKinsey Academy, offers perspectives on successful and emerging pedagogical methods, and suggests ideas for future experimentation.

entry_points.title: Mckinsey academy:
entry_points.subtitle: We provide an immersive experience for our learners:
entry_points.content:
Curated and discoverable content
Intuitive navigation through courses and lessons
Tools for social interaction within cohorts
Data visualizations of progress

entry_points.title: OUR PROGRAM OFFERING:
entry_points.subtitle: Introducing the McKinsey Management Program:
entry_points.content: The McKinsey Management Program is our inaugural set of courses for rising professionals looking to build leadership and management capabilities.

entry_points.title: ABOUT McKINSEY ACADEMY:
entry_points.subtitle: McKinsey Academy is a dynamic digital platform for business education.
entry_points.content: McKinsey Academy provides scalable business education that is rigorous, relevant, and applicable.

entry_points.title: OUR PEDAGOGY:
entry_points.subtitle: McKinsey Academy Pedagogy is based on four core principles:
entry_points.content:
Learning by doing
Focus on expert performance
Deep feedback
Social Learning

features.title: Practitioner's perspective
features.content: Taught by McKinsey partners and external business leaders who provide practical "how to" guidance.

features.title: Social Learning with Group-based Projects
features.content: Collaboration with peers across industries and geographies, and in community discussion forums.

features.title: Deep feedback
features.content: Immediate, response- contingent feedback enables richer learning and provides guidance on where to go to learn more.

features.title: McKinsey TA guidance
features.content: McKinsey consultants serve as teaching assistants, providing distinctive engagement and guidance.

features.title: ADAPTIVE LEARNING MECHANICS
features.content: Rich learning experience incorporates ground-breaking techniques in adaptive learning and game mechanics.

features.title: Rigorous Analytics
features.content: Advanced analytics measure participant progress, social engagement, and proficiency vs. peers.

quotes.quote: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily; even if you had no title or position.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: The key to successful leadership today is influence, not authority.
quotes.name: Kenneth Blanchard
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
quotes.name: General Dwight Eisenhower
quotes.title: 34th President of the United States

quotes.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy
quotes.title: 35th President of the United States

quotes.quote: You don’t lead by pointing and telling people some place to go. You lead by going to that place and making a case.
quotes.name: Ken Kesey
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: A great leader’s courage to fulfill his vision comes from passion, not position.
quotes.name: John Maxwell
quotes.title: Author

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.name: John Quincy Adams
quotes.title: 6th President of the United States
